v.v: Praise him for the mighty deeds that he has performed;
Praise him by blowing trumpets loudly;
Praise him by beating drums and by dancing.
I want all living creatures to praise Yahweh!

v: Praise him who is in his fortress in heaven!
praise him because he is very great!
praise him by playing harps and small stringed instruments!
Praise him by playing stringed instruments and by playing flutes!
praise him by clashing very loud cymbals!
